org.giiwa.dao

类 UID

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.dao.UID

  • public final class UID
extends java.lang.Object
    The UID Class used to create unique id, or sequence, random string
    作者:
    joe

      • id

        public static java.lang.String id(java.lang.Object... ss)
        generate the unique id by the parameter
        if the parameter are same, the id will be same, the "id" is H32 of hash(64bit) of parameters.
        参数:
        ss - the parameters
        返回:
        string
